testsuite.test:
Selectors nth child
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the INNER element have a WHITE background color, and the OUTER element a RED background color?

Selectors selector
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the element have a RED BACKGROUND color?

Selectors selector 2
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does 'The element' have a BLACK BACKGROUND color?

Selectors last child selector
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the THIRD ITEM have a RED BACKGROUND color?

Selectors last child selector 2
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the THIRD ITEM have a BLACK BACKGROUND color?

Selectors disabled
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the text INPUT RED and is it NOT EDITABLE?

Selectors checked
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Check the checkbox. Does it move to the right?

Selectors attributes
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the FIRST element have a RED BACKGROUND color, and the SECOND a BLACK?

Selectors attributes
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does this element have a RED BACKGROUND and UNDERLINED text?

Selectors nth child
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does this element have a RED BACKGROUND and UNDERLINED text?

Selectors nth child 2n
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Do the SECOND AND FOURTH items have a RED BACKGROUND?

Selectors nth child 2n
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Do the FIRST and THIRD items now have a BLACK BACKGROUND color?

Selectors overflow auto
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Can you scroll the element?

multiple background images
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Do you see TWO IMAGES in the element?

background position local ONLY to be done if overflow auto is supported
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Scroll the element. DOES THE IMAGE SCROLL with the element?

border radius
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the element have ROUNDED CORNERS?

rgba colors
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the text RED?

hsla colors
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the text RED?

outline
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Does the element have a RED BORDER?

letter spacing
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Are the letters in the second line farther apart than in the first?

word spacing
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Are the words in the second line farther apart than in the first?
